name: Street
long_description: You're standing on the street and this description is very long. Later on, somebody that is better at writing game descriptions will come along and repalce this with something amazing. Until then, you will just note that you can look at the "No Skateboarding" sign, and also the Guardrails. Not case sensitive. Yay!
short_description: This busy street has some nice guardrails, but unfortunately, somebody put up a "No Skateboarding" sign! Jerks.

room_features.name: "No Skateboarding" sign
room_features.description: The sign states very clearly that skateboarding is prohibited in this area. Fine: $300

room_features.name: Guardrails
room_features.description: These guardrails look perfect for grinding on with a skateboard!
